attributes.action: With a no deal scenario we should have a referendum to stay or leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details:
With a no deal scenario on the table, an ongoing pandemic and a £2trn debt with slumping economy, it is unsafe to leave the EU without a trade deal and a viable plan for new trade deals. 

The UK government does not have a concrete plan and risks jeopardising 67+ million people's lives. The health and socioeconomic risks cannot be certain after such a rough year 2020. It's the politicians duties to be 100% sure they're moving forward with the right plan to protect our UK citizens.
attributes.background:
With no concrete deal worked out between the EU and UK  I would like the government to hold another referendum to either stay or leave the EU.
On the grounds of uncertainty.  What is the plan?

rejection.details:
The UK has already left the EU, but you might like to sign the following petitions calling for related actions:

To Seek a 1 year Extension to the Brexit Transition Period & a Second Referendum: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554492

Referendum and parliamentary vote on ending UK-EU negotiations with no deal: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554815

Referendum on re-joining the EU: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550951
